sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import trinixVideo from './video.mp4'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; const AboutUs = () => { const styles = { pageContainer: { marginTop: '64px', minHeight: '100vh', fontFamily: "Lato, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif" }, heroSection: { background: '#fbf7f1', // warm parchment tone padding: '40px 0 40px', textAlign: 'center', borderBottom: '1px solid #efe7dc' }, container: { maxWidth: '1100px', margin: '0 auto', padding: '0 24px' }, title: { fontFamily: 'Playfair Display, Georgia, serif', fontSize: window.innerWidth <= 768 ? '2.5rem' : '3.25rem', fontWeight: 800, color: '#3a2f1d', marginBottom: '12px', lineHeight: '1.15', letterSpacing: '-0.01em' }, subtitle: { fontSize: '1.125rem', color: '#5c5344', maxWidth: '820px', margin: '0 auto 28px', lineHeight: '1.8', fontWeight: 400 }, badge: { display: 'inline-block', background: '#3a2f1d', color: '#fff', padding: '6px 12px', borderRadius: '999px', fontSize: '0.85rem', letterSpacing: '0.06em', textTransform: 'uppercase' }, // Mission / Vision sectionSoft: { background: '#fff', padding: '48px 0', borderBottom: '1px solid #f0e9df' }, twoCol: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: window.innerWidth <= 768 ? '1fr' : '1fr 1fr', gap: '40px', alignItems: 'start' }, card: { background: '#fff', border: '1px solid #efe7dc', borderRadius: '12px', padding: '24px', boxShadow: '0 6px 18px rgba(58,47,29,0.06)' }, h3: { fontFamily: 'Playfair Display, Georgia, serif', fontSize: '1.5rem', color: '#3a2f1d', margin: '0 0 8px 0' }, p: { color: '#564b3a', lineHeight: '1.8' }, // Founders message banner-like band: { background: '#f7efe5', padding: '48px 0', borderTop: '1px solid #efe7dc', borderBottom: '1px solid #efe7dc' }, bandWrap: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: window.innerWidth <= 768 ? '1fr' : '320px 1fr', gap: '0', overflow: 'hidden', borderRadius: '12px', border: '1px solid #efe7dc', background: '#fff', boxShadow: '0 8px 24px rgba(58,47,29,0.06)' }, bandImg: { width: '100%', height: '100%', objectFit: 'cover', display: 'block' }, bandContent: { padding: '24px 28px' }, bandName: { fontFamily: 'Playfair Display, Georgia, serif', fontSize: '1.375rem', color: '#3a2f1d', fontWeight: 800 }, bandTitle: { color: '#8a6a2f', fontWeight: 700, margin: '6px 0 16px' }, // Story section: { padding: '64px 0' }, storyGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: window.innerWidth <= 768 ? '1fr' : '1fr 1fr', gap: '48px', alignItems: 'center' }, videoContainer: { position: 'relative', borderRadius: '12px', overflow: 'hidden', boxShadow: '0 12px 30px rgba(58,47,29,0.18)', border: '1px solid #efe7dc' }, storyVideo: { width: '100%', height: '360px', objectFit: 'cover' }, // Timeline timelineSection: { background: '#fbf7f1', padding: '80px 0', borderTop: '1px solid #efe7dc' }, timelineTitle: { fontFamily: 'Playfair Display, Georgia, serif', fontSize: window.innerWidth <= 768 ? '2rem' : '2.75rem', fontWeight: 800, color: '#3a2f1d', textAlign: 'center', margin: '0 0 12px' }, timelineSubtitle: { textAlign: 'center', color: '#5c5344', margin: '0 auto 48px', maxWidth: '760px', lineHeight: '1.8' }, timelineWrap: { maxWidth: '900px', margin: '0 auto' }, timelineItem: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: window.innerWidth <= 768 ? '1fr' : '140px 1fr', gap: '20px', padding: '20px 0', borderBottom: '1px dashed #e7dccc' }, timelineYear: { fontWeight: 900, color: '#8a6a2f' }, timelineHead: { fontWeight: 800, color: '#3a2f1d' }, timelineText: { color: '#564b3a', lineHeight: '1.8' } }; const journey = [ { year: 'October 2024', head: 'First Project: SOS', text: 'We began our journey with the launch of Sankatmochan Outreach Service (SOS), our first major project aimed at building a social-impact platform to connect NGOs, businesses, and communities.' }, { year: 'March 2025', head: 'First Fintech Research Publication', text: 'Our team published its first fintech research paper, exploring innovative models for digital finance and global monetary systems.' }, { year: 'July 2025', head: 'First Subsidiary: Webstitch', text: 'We established Webstitch, our first subsidiary, focused on web development and digital services to support businesses and individuals.' }, { year: 'August 2025', head: 'Birth of Trinix Private Limited', text: 'Recognizing the growing scale of our initiatives, we officially founded Trinix Private Limited as the parent company to bring all our projects and subsidiaries under one unified vision.' }, { year: 'September 2025', head: 'Second Fintech Research Publication', text: 'We achieved another milestone by releasing our second fintech research paper, furthering our contributions to innovative financial technologies and research-driven solutions.' } ]; return (
Vedic Vigyanam Explorer Society

About VVES

Leading authority in the preservation and interpretation of Vedic Science, integrating it into modern academic and cultural frameworks.

Our Mission

To preserve, research, and disseminate the ancient wisdom of Vedic sciences, making this knowledge accessible to modern scholars, researchers, and enthusiasts while maintaining the authenticity and depth of traditional understanding.

Our Vision

"To become a leading authority in the preservation and interpretation of Vedic Science, integrating it into modern academic and cultural frameworks."

Dr. Sanjay Kumar Sharma
President
Our Vision for Vedic Sciences

The Vedic knowledge system represents one of humanity's most profound intellectual achievements. Our mission at VVES is to ensure that this ancient wisdom is not only preserved but also made relevant for contemporary understanding and application.

Through rigorous research, comprehensive documentation, and innovative educational programs, we are creating bridges between the ancient and modern worlds. Our work encompasses not just the preservation of texts, but also the interpretation and application of Vedic principles in today's context.

Vedic Knowledge - Ancient wisdom for modern times

We strive to bridge the gap between ancient Vedic knowledge and contemporary scientific understanding, fostering a deeper appreciation for India's rich intellectual heritage.

Our Journey

Milestones in Trinix's growth and development

{journey.map((j, i) => (
{j.year}
{j.head}
{j.text}
))}
); }; export default AboutUs;
